ygData.subject: Why EQ is so buggy
ygData.msgSnippet: It sounds like many of you on this list are in the technical field as either DBAs, developers or Architects (I m an architect).  I found this nice little
ygData.messageBody:
It sounds like many of you on this list are in the technical field as either DBAs, developers or Architects (I'm an architect). I found this nice little coding guideline that I'm pretty sure Verant uses to write EQ given the sheer number of bugs that are present and the volume at which new bugs are introduced...

Only thing missing in this is Verant's obvious lack of a solid source control environment or misuse of what they have.

http://www.mindprod.com/unmain.html

Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 45th song
Prexus


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
